articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspects KPA unit
Reception given by Ministry of People's Armed Forces
Japanese authorities' suppression of Chongryon under fire
Film show held
Anti-U.S. struggle called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Film show held 
    Pyongyang, December 23 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of the People's Armed Forces held a film show yesterday on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
 Present there on invitation were military attaches of different embassies here and generals and officers of the KPA.    
 Its participants saw the Korean documentary film "the 65th anniversary of the foundation of the heroic Korean People's Army" on significant celebrations of the Army Day.
